channel.title: Is the near future of Whonix affected by recent troubles of tor?
channel.description:
It seems like tor stopped playing nice with certain Linux kernels. Transparent proxying, which seems to be a very important feature, have stopped working. For example see these bug reports:
https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/25380 https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/25401
Does this have any impact on Whonix?

item.title: Is the near future of Whonix affected by recent troubles of tor?
item.dc:creator: Segalla
item.description:
The bug on Tor bug tracker was marked as won’t fix, since it looks like Tor devs preferred to shift the trouble to the Linux kernel.

Read full topic
item.source: Is the near future of Whonix affected by recent troubles of tor?

item.title: Is the near future of Whonix affected by recent troubles of tor?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Debian stable doesn’t include either kernel version so it should be fixed long before it could affect us.

Read full topic
item.source: Is the near future of Whonix affected by recent troubles of tor?
